original_text: “‘But the children rebelled against me: They did not follow my decrees, they were not careful to keep my laws, of which I said, “The person who obeys them will live by them,” and they desecrated my Sabbaths. So I said I would pour out my wrath on them and spend my anger against them in the wilderness.
korean_text: 그러나 그들의 자손이 내게 반역하여 사람이 지켜 행하면 그로 말미암아 삶을 얻을 나의 율례를 따르지 아니하며 나의 규례를 지켜 행하지 아니하였고 나의 안식일을 더럽힌지라 이에 내가 이르기를 내가 광야에서 그들에게 내 분노를 쏟으며 그들에게 내 진노를 이루리라 하였으나

sentences.original_text: But the children rebelled against me
They did not follow my decrees
they were not careful to keep my laws
The person who obeys them will live by them
sentences.korean_translation: 사람이 만일 이것을 잘 지키면 그것으로 살리라

sentences.original_text: I would pour out my wrath on them
and spend my anger against them in the wilderness
sentences.korean_translation: 광야에서 내 분노를 그들에게 마치리라 하였다
